author: M
title: Basketball League: Flyboys & Twisters Win
text:
October 18, 2015 | 0 Comments 
230 points were scored inside the Cedarbridge Gymnasium as the 2015/16 Cellone Island Basketball League Season continued with a double-header. 
The opening game of the night saw the Flyboys go 2- 0 on the new season defeating the Skyforce 45 – 44, Kieron Burgess scored 23 points to lead the Flyboys to victory, while the Skyforce were led by Jahmair Trott with 12 points. 
The game of the week saw Twisters go 2-0 on the season and getting revenge on the Thunder Cats who knock them out of the Playoffs and went on to win the Championship last Season, defeating them 89 – 52. Both Kevin Stevens and Karim O’Connor scored 28 points each for the Twisters, while Chris Crumpler scored 14 points for the Thunder Cats. Related Stories
